ygData.subject: RE: /auc Looking to buy a clue
ygData.msgSnippet: The words: I will take a look at this are missing.  I don t get the feeling that GZ recognizes it as a bug. My read is that he is brushing it off as
ygData.messageBody:
The words: "I will take a look at this" are missing. I don't get the
feeling that GZ recognizes it as a bug. My read is that he is brushing it
off as 'anecdotal evidence' and one player's opinion rather than accepting
the possibility of a bug or unintentional change. Or he was just giving a
quick answer because he was in a forum where he was being asked lots and
lots of questions.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 11:30 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] /auc Looking to buy a clue

From: <kim@...>

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> 1. Is Lullaby bugged or has it had its effectiveness
reduced? I cant seem to
>
> keep low, low greens asleep. I get the head nods message
and they continue
> to attack. From my experience and the posts of other Bards
seems like this
> song has become almost useless. Is this just something we
will have to live
> with?
>
> REPSONSE - Nothing has changed - though it does lose some
of its
> effectiveness against higher level creatures.

I actually take this as a good sign. Lullaby was not
supposed
to have been changed, but something they did changed it
indirectly. That would mean if we/they ever find out what
the
problem is, we deserve a fix.
